bioconda.name: bioconductor-crlmm
bioconda.summary: Genotype Calling (CRLMM) and Copy Number Analysis tool for Affymetrix SNP 5.0 and 6.0 and Illumina arrays

biotools.summary: Faster implementation specific to SNP 5.0 and 6.0 arrays, as well as a copy number tool specific to 5.0, 6.0, and Illumina platforms.

bioschemas.name: crlmm
bioschemas.summary: Faster implementation specific to SNP 5.0 and 6.0 arrays, as well as a copy number tool specific to 5.0, 6.0, and Illumina platforms.
